segments.text: Are you doing something on Saturday evening ? If not , welcome to my new apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You moved to a new place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have been busy emptying the packing boxes and cleaning up the mats . Right now , it looks like a home . I would like to have a small celebration party . Please do come .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for inviting me . Sounds lovely ! I would like to come . Where is your new apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is in the DX community , Room 306 , No . 2 building . It is very easy to find . Just ask the guard at the entrance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I invited all the colleagues in our department and also my former neighbor , Paul . He is a very good person . You should meet him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I will be there around 6 . Is that ok for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , great . I am happy you are coming .
segments.speaker: S1
